name: Fake to Escape
description:
You’re a sneaky slime trying to escape a large castle. You can absorb objects and then form into them to trick and avoid enemy guards. 

Controls:

  • Move: (Left and Right keys) OR ( ‘A’ and ‘D’ keys)
  • Jump: Space
  • Dash: Shift
  • Absorb object: Down key OR ‘S’ key
  • Disguise as object: Up key OR ‘W’ key

Credit:

Music:

  • Dark Reign by Shype (www.opengameart.org/users/shype)
  • The Tavern by Adam Morton (www.AdamMortonMusic.com)

Sound Effects:

  • SideArm Studios (www.sidearmstudios.com)

Fonts:

  • Pixelfy by Stefie Justprince (https://www.dafont.com/pixelfy.font) 
  • Pixeldust by dustBUST (https://www.dafont.com/pixeldust.font) 

Colour Palettes:

  • archaon by RAINDRINKER (https://lospec.com/palette-list/archaon-15) 
  • Shadow Slime by slimysubstance (https://lospec.com/palette-list/shadow-slime) 
  • Cryptic Ocean by Klafooty (https://lospec.com/palette-list/cryptic-ocean) 

Theme interpretation (It is not real):

I looked up some synonyms for “not real” or “unreal”, I found words like "pretend" and "mock" which inspired this idea. A slime that can absorb and then mock objects, as it tries to escape! 

This is my first game jam! Happy to hear any feedback or constructive criticism!
